data.name: Industrial Petting
data.detailed_description:
You have always dreamed of becoming a pet engineer on the edge of the galaxy, and now you can live that dream! With your orbital pet elevator landed on a distant world, it's time to tame the local wildlife, and build more of them.

  • Pet Strange Animals
  • Feed them exotic vegetables
  • Build factories and automate petting
  • Invite some friends to create a massive operation together
  • Create fun, adorable, and unnatural evolutions of the local wildlife
  • Explore the planet and discover what secrets might be hidden on this distant world

The galaxy demands ethically sourced, fair trade exotic pets, and you're the one to supply it. With a certified joy-detecting space elevator, only creatures that are happy, fed, and comfortable can be exported to the market. Farm local produce and make extravagent meals to charm the creatures, or just give them a little bit of personal attention.

Drop-in, drop-out multiplayer means that friends can join you anytime! No server configurations, no special modes. Just invite them from your friends list, or make your game open and let any of them join.
data.about_the_game:
You have always dreamed of becoming a pet engineer on the edge of the galaxy, and now you can live that dream! With your orbital pet elevator landed on a distant world, it's time to tame the local wildlife, and build more of them.

  • Pet Strange Animals
  • Feed them exotic vegetables
  • Build factories and automate petting
  • Invite some friends to create a massive operation together
  • Create fun, adorable, and unnatural evolutions of the local wildlife
  • Explore the planet and discover what secrets might be hidden on this distant world

The galaxy demands ethically sourced, fair trade exotic pets, and you're the one to supply it. With a certified joy-detecting space elevator, only creatures that are happy, fed, and comfortable can be exported to the market. Farm local produce and make extravagent meals to charm the creatures, or just give them a little bit of personal attention.

Drop-in, drop-out multiplayer means that friends can join you anytime! No server configurations, no special modes. Just invite them from your friends list, or make your game open and let any of them join.
data.short_description: Industrial Petting is the chance for you and your friends to explore an alien world, find new pets, get them to love you, and sell them on the galactic market. Build factories to make more creatures, farms to feed them, and gadgets to entertain them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: 64-Bit Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: 64-Bit Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 64-Bit Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
